location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Jonathan Duncan, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage and some of the text on f. 47 is difficult to read as a result of a hole in the folio, which has obscured part of the body of the letter. Unfortunately, this includes a crucial detail essential to the complete understanding of the content.

mods.abstract: In the letter the Resident is writing on behalf of Abdallah Aga, however the precise reasons behind this have been lost due to pest damage.
